title: Frames Dropping for 0 Damn reason
body: Alright So I followed through with every single fix and tune up step Riot suggests, ( https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting )  I did all that,  I reset my computer.  Im hard wired into 1gb/s internet   however for about a week now, Im getting miserable frame drops   Prior to this I would run between 320fps and 400fps no matter what was happening in game,   now Im running at about 330fps average but sporadically dropping to 19,  always 19 or 20  every maybe 30 seconds and it causes the screen to lock up and crash,  its making me take tower shots and die without even knowing WTF happened.

replies.body:
If you're running Windows 10, it's possible this issue is being caused by the Windows Game Bar, which includes a *Game DVR* feature that has been causing low FPS and game crashes for certain players. I'd recommend [disabling this feature entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes.

Let me know the results.

Windows 8

Currently reinstalling the whole game, saving logs from the hextech repair tool before and after this reinstall

Ah, you'll actually want to install the Windows 8.1 upgrade since there are some really important packages in that update that will help your computer be more compatible with League. Let me know how that goes.
